title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 – v1.08 + 8 DLCs
body:
NARUTO SHIPPUDEN Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 – v1.08 + 8 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Fighting, Third-person, 3D
Companies: CyberConnect2 / Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 37.4 GB
Repack Size: from 26 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on NARUTO.SHIPPUDEN.Ultimate.Ninja.STORM.4.Road.to.Boruto.Next.Generations-CODEX ISO release: codex-naruto.shippuden.ultimate.ninja.storm.4.road.to.boruto.next.generations.iso (40,143,028,224 bytes)
  • All DLCs are included and activated, game version is 1.08
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with ALL components)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of credits videos and voicepacks you don’t need
  • When installing a single voice pack, be sure to enable this language later in game options or you’ll hear silence
  • For some reason developers made Portuguese-Brazil and Spanish voiceovers turnable only when OS locale is set to Brazilian or Spanish US
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 37.4 to 26~29 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~40 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~1 hour 20 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly (ONLY when installed with ALL components)
  • HDD space after installation: 40 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the text/GUI language
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack by FitGirl

Game Description

The latest opus in the acclaimed STORM series is taking you on a colourful and breathtaking ride. Take advantage of the totally revamped battle system and prepare to dive into the most epic fights you’ve ever seen in the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM series!

Prepare for the most awaited STORM game ever created!

Included DLCs

  • Pre Order DLC
  • Shikamaru’s Tale Extra Scenario Pack
  • Gaara’s Tale Extra Scenario Pack
  • The Sound Four Characters Pack
  • Season Pass Bonus
  • Traditional Festival Costume
  • Road to Boruto Expansion
  • Next Generations Pack

You can skip downloading of credits & voice files and you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-credits.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with English UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-english.bin & all main files (01-06).

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous game repacks.
